FarmersMarket.Title: Pirate's Market
FarmersMarket.Description: Trade yer bounty here, ye landlubber!
FarmersMarket.noproducts: Ye have no %s to trade, ye scurvy dog!
FarmersMarket.notsolditem: This here treasure can't be traded at this port!
FarmersMarket.error: Arrr! Somethin' went wrong while tradin' yer treasure!
FarmersMarket.toofar: Ye sailed too far from the market, matey!
